class.name: spinning_lidar_utils/LaserRangeFilterNodelet
class.description: Nodelet for filtering laser scans by range.

class.name: spinning_lidar_utils/ScanToCloudConverterNodelet
class.description: Nodelet for converting a laser scan into a point cloud. It also transforms the point cloud to a target frame.

class.name: spinning_lidar_utils/InterruptLaserAssemblerNodelet
class.description: Nodelet for assembling laser scans after receiving an trigger message.
